CustomField.formula: LEFT(IF(INCLUDES( Media_Type__c , "Radio"), $Label.MO_RTL_Radio +", ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Media_Type__c , "Television"), $Label.MO_Television + ", ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Media_Type__c , "Print"), $Label.MO_Print +", " , NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Media_Type__c , "Social Media"), $Label.MO_Social_Media +", ",NULL ),(LEN(IF(INCLUDES( Media_Type__c , "Radio"), $Label.MO_RTL_Radio +", ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Media_Type__c , "Television"), $Label.MO_Television + ", ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Media_Type__c , "Print"), $Label.MO_Print +", " , NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Media_Type__c , "Social Media"), $Label.MO_Social_Media +", ",NULL )) - 2) )
CustomField.label: fMediaType
